page.title: 06PUBLIC TRANSPORT.
page.content: Many local people are totally dependent upon public transport to enable them to go shopping with the majority of shopping taking place either at a large nearby supermarket (ASDA at Carcroft) or at Doncaster which has an excellent market and many major stores. The decision to shop at either Carcroft of Doncaster relates very much to the cheap fares policy of the {SOUTH YORKSHIRE {METROPOLITAN COUNTY COUNCIL.}44% of the county's total expenditure is spent in supporting this policy. Of course this has led to a large increase in rate demand and has brought the council into conflict with central government but it has provided a very cheap public transport system available to eveyone travelling in South Yorkshire. For example, the single adult fare from Norton to
